title: CAN I HAVE AN ASNWER FROM RIOT MEMBER?
body: Can i have an aswer please? So i was doing ranks for my g5 series with my bud to climb and suddenly all players dc-ed but we all recalled and almost all of the enemy team recalled too but what? vayne and the leblanc didnt recaled we found ourselves with out 2 towers and with a minus 1 infernal drake then we lost ... can i have my lp back or something becose thats just shame we all dc-ed but some of them didnt recalled thats shame - DODOREXpro / Mr Killerch0 thats our names EUNE

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Unfortunately, we aren't able to grant LP, regardless of the situation. The system is built in a way that LP values cannot be modified, as to keep competitive integrity. Sorry. :c

Riot has to manually turn on Loss Prevention for everyone when there is a widespread issue, but otherwise they can't do anything about your lost LP. They will absolutely never mess with your rank to prevent abuse.
